Mummies don't lie. en.wikipedia.org------------------------------------------------------- CAIRO-- Egyptian antiquities supremo Zahi Hawass insisted Tuesday that Tutankhamun was not black despite calls by US black activists to recognize the boy king's dark skin color. Tutankhamun was not black, and the portrayal of ancient Egyptian civilization as black has no element of truth to it, Zahi Hawass told reporters. CAIRO. Spy''/> Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer has said that the Xbox 360 is not a games console. He told USA Today that its multimedia capabilities and Kinect support makes it an entertainment device. Xbox isn't a gaming console. Xbox is a family entertainment centre. It's a place to socialise, he said.`` It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming.
